features: Compatible with Thule Urban Glide 2.0 Jogging Stroller, Thule Urban Glide 2.0 Double Jogging Stroller, and Thule Glide 2.0 Performance Jogging Stroller
Swivels out of the way for easy loading of your child
Gives the child a comfortable and secure bar to hold onto while in the stroller
body.description: The Thule Bumper bar is an accessory for the Thule urban glide 2, Thule urban glide 2 double, and Thule glide 2. It gives your child a comfortable and secure bar to hold onto while strolling.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Bring your life Whether it's exploring the spectacular nature of the great outdoors or traveling the world with family and friends, we all have a passion for enjoying an active life. At Thule, we share your desire to spend more time enjoying your passions - which means less time worrying about how to bring all the stuff we need. For more than 75 years, Thule has been creating solutions to simplify life's adventures. Our focus has been on developing smart, stylish products that are sound, high quality, safe, and easy to use. Whatever your passion, whatever your pursuit. Wherever you're going, whatever you're bringing. With Thule you're free to live your active life to the fullest.

Quality you can rely on We’ll never know what adventures you’ll be taking your equipment on. That’s why we develop our products to manage any weather, any temperature, and any terrain in the whole world. We’ve come to the conclusion that nothing else will do. Every new product is put through temperatures of icy northern cold and burning desert heat, long sessions of intensive UV radiation, a salt chamber for corrosion endurance, several pressure and capacity tests – and finally a machine that shakes it for a lifetime’s worth, simulating two trips around the world in less than a week. Yes, the Thule Test Center is kind of brutal. But that’s the way the world is. And since we only give the sign of approval to products that have had the whole world against them (and survived it), it’s no wonder we’re international leaders in safety and durability – or that we even exceed the standards.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works with glide 1, with a little ingenuity
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for the Urban Glide 1, knowing it was for the 2 version. It just took a drill and a few minutes to widen the hole on one side of the bar clamp and it fits great and snaps on and off smoothly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Make sure you know stroller model
reviews.reviewText: Got this for a stroller we purchased used. Thought stroller was a Glide 2 and it ended up being a Glide 1. Saw many google searches of buyers saying that the handle doesn’t fit on one of the sides and that they “drilled” the hole on the one side larger and it fit. We had to do the same thing and fits snuggly in place….Love the bar but just wanted to make you aware that if the bar doesn’t fit it might be because you have older model stroller. If you feel comfortable enlarging the hole on the bar end you may find it works just fine.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 14, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Handy addition to a great stroller
reviews.reviewText: Awesome little bar. Easy to install and very handy for my toddler to hold on too when we are jogging through the neighborhood. A bit pricey but a handy tool for the Thule.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 10, 2018
reviews.reviewText: This bumper bar is great. It was very easy to install. Very easy to use with just one hand as well. Appears to be very sturdy. I just wish that the Thule Urban Glide 2 already came with this bumper bar. Oh, well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 30, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Worth the money
reviews.reviewText: Once I opened the box I see why this piece is not cheap. However, the design and I Uluru make it worth the price! My kid loves to put her feet up on it or grab it with her hands. We can attach toys too it too. I rarely have to open and close it at this point but I love that it opens on both sides and easily swivels out of the way.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Necessary, but shouldbr come with the stroller
reviews.reviewText: This definitely helped holding my baby's blanket in place during walks and was ready to installFor the price you pay for the stroller though, it really should have been included.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is perfectly fit to our thule urban 2.0

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 16, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect addition to our Urban Glide 2
reviews.reviewText: Exactly what we needed for our Urban Glide 2! Arrived quickly and installed easily!

Si tienes la urban glide y tu nene es mayor de 8 meses, pilla esto... cambia el concepto de la silla....el peque está mucho más cómodo, y si vas muy deprisa a alguna parte puedes incluso no atarle, teniendo esto
Sehr gut. Unser kleiner liebt es sich festhalten zu können.

reviews.reviewTitle: Must have for the Thule Glide 2
reviews.reviewText: I highly recommend this bar if you have the Thule Glide 2. My child enjoys her ride more and I feel more safe when jogging with this bar as it gives my child the ability to brace herself when I slow down.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on June 7, 2021
reviews.reviewText: Hood bumper bar easy to put on

È l’accessorio indispensabile per il passeggino thule urban glide 2. Adesso che ha 7 mesi il bebè si muove molto, così si attacca alla barra e sta seduto bene con le cinghie di sicurezza non troppo strette
